About

About collectif

We operate in the shadows to bring light to the truth.

Our Mission

collectif is an underground intelligence network dedicated to exposing corruption, manipulation, and exploitation in the Web3 space. We believe in radical transparency and the power of anonymous whistleblowers.

Our Methods

  • Anonymous sources protection
  • Deep technical analysis
  • Independent investigations
  • Zero compromise on truth
Truth is found in the darkest corners of the digital realm.

Secure Communication

For secure communication and whistleblowing, use our PGP key:

Our Values

Radical Transparency

We believe in exposing the truth, no matter how uncomfortable or inconvenient it may be.

Source Protection

The safety and anonymity of our sources is our highest priority. We employ advanced security measures to protect whistleblowers.

Technical Integrity

Our investigations are backed by rigorous technical analysis and verifiable evidence.

Independence

We remain free from corporate influence and financial pressures. Our only allegiance is to the truth.

Decentralization

We believe in distributing power and dismantling centralized control structures that enable corruption.

Community First

Our mission serves the broader Web3 community, protecting users from exploitation and manipulation.

Our Promise

We will never:

  • Reveal our sources
  • Accept bribes or hush money
  • Bow to corporate pressure
  • Compromise on our values

run by CollectifHQ • founded by a team of former mainstream journalists tired of corporate media censorship
